sentence.Network_en: They came panting up to his door with their unwieldy baggage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们提着笨重的行李气喘吁吁地来到他门口。

sentence.Network_en: His firm must contend with the unwieldy Russian bureaucracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的公司必须与俄罗斯庞大的官僚机构周旋。

sentence.Network_en: This machine is too unwieldy to move.
sentence.Network_cn: 这台机器太笨重了,很难搬动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以u开头的英语英文单词 ... unwarranted 无根据的 unwieldy 笨重的，笨拙的 unwillingly 不情愿地，勉强地.
以u开头的英语英文单词 ... unwarranted 无根据的 unwieldy 笨重的，笨拙的 unwillingly 不情愿地，勉强地.
《星空》：一个关于成长的故事- 双语新闻 -... ... undercurrent 潜流 unwieldy 笨拙的，不实用的 whisk 扫掉，弄走.
冗杂的对应哪个单词_百度知道 ...  unwieldy adj. 笨拙的；笨重的；不灵便的；难处理的 tedious adj. 沉闷的；冗长乏味的.

list.abs: An unwieldy parcel ., 一个笨重的包裹.
Thus enumeration and computation became unwieldy ., 因此列举和计算变得很难处理.
one of its trickiest tasks would be handling Japan's unwieldy bureaucracy .一项艰巨的任务是改革日本庞大的政府机构。
the new Wraith combat fighters and Valkyrie missile frigates proved to be an unwieldy combination against agile zerg airborne organisms .新的幽灵战斗机和导弹护卫舰女神在对抗灵活的虫族空军时被证明是一个笨拙的组合。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'lacking strength, infirm'): from un- 'not' + wieldy (in the obsolete sense 'active')

entry.tran: 沉甸甸的；粗笨的；笨重的
entry.def: If you describe an object as unwieldy, you mean that it is difficult to move or carry because it is so big or heavy.

example.ex: They came panting up to his door with their unwieldy baggage.
example.tran: 他们提着笨重的行李气喘吁吁地来到他门口。

entry.def: If you describe a system as unwieldy, you mean that it does not work very well as a result of it being too large or badly organized.

example.ex: His firm must contend with the unwieldy Russian bureaucracy.
example.tran: 他的公司必须与俄罗斯庞大的官僚机构周旋。

means.word_mean: 1. difficult to use or handle or manage because of size or weight or shape;

sentences.sentence: "we set about towing the unwieldy structure into the shelter"

means.word_mean: 2. lacking grace in movement or posture;

sentences.sentence: "a gawky lad with long ungainly legs"
"what an ungainly creature a giraffe is"
"heaved his unwieldy figure out of his chair"

means.word_mean: 不易移动或操作的;笨重的,庞大的

sentences.en: This machine is too unwieldy to move.
sentences.cn: 这台机器太笨重了, 很难搬动。
